ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, today I sent in a longgg  report on their skills, and how they are going about them. As to answer your question, pottery is now useless, profit is none
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, today I sent in a longgg report on their skills, and how they are going about them.

As to answer your question, pottery is now useless, profit is none acceptable as it costs more to
use or make something then it does to sell it. As I said earlier in my report on the changes, this
change has also been made to many other sketches in pottery, and the profit for those are not
acceptable either. Your right, we should have the abilitie to choose what we want to do in EQ.
Warrior, healer, venturer, greedy merchant it's all our choice, why you ask, because we are paying
for it. And in previous statements made by Sony, indicated that these were possible, that we as
members of society have the abilities to choose what we want to do. Now witht he vamping of most
skills *regardless if it's to balance them out*, is leaning us more into the Fight kill be a
warrior type character, or such. Either case, someone couldn't take up some skills and just become
masters at them now because of the changes, their pointless in making anything especially Pottery,
what can you do with a empty Pie Tin, make a pie from bakery ? Bakery it'self was changed and is
now to much to increase the skill in and the profit is again nill and void.

Where's EQ going with all this I ask, when are we going to say something about the changes ? Well,
I already have said my piece to them. you don't need to flame them or rant about the changes, but
imply your own feelings towards what you think is going on, and always remember the fact that you
are paying for this game to play it.

Thulgar
Grand Master of the Mystical Knights
http://www.efni.com/~thulgar
